attributes.action: to get rid of all the mps
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we dont need any mp gordon brown and the queen can run this country thats what there being paid to do then there wouldnt be any more of anyone spending the tax payers cash for lavish life style,if he cannot do this then its time he shipped out and let the queen run the country

rejection.details: Government does not control who sits in Parliament. This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
